articles.description: Taking control of stress with the foods we eat can help to counter inflammation in the body, as well as elevated levels of the hormone cortisol, which can otherwise lead to high blood sugar, increased appetite and weight gain. Here are food ideas to help you …
articles.content:
(CNN)Stress levels may be high these days, but did you know that what we choose to eat can help to reduce stress, ultimately allowing us to take charge of our mental health?

articles.author: Kerri O'Brien
articles.title: Virginia house bill would allow some to opt out of the COVID-19 vaccine - WAVY.com
articles.description: A bill — still alive in the Virginia House of Delegates — would allow parents or guardians the right to reject a Covid-19 vaccine for their child — based on their religious beliefs.
articles.content: RICHMOND, Va. (WRIC) — A bill, still alive in the Virginia House of Delegates, would allow parents or guardians the right to reject a Covid-19 vaccine for their child — based on their religious belie… [+1806 chars]
